task_text: On page refresh, sliders still duplicate; fix by preventing duplicate Adjustables and avoiding auto-add during import.
summary: Fixed slider duplication after refresh by deduping AdjustableManager.adjustables (keyed by element index + editItem + sharedSlider) before creating sliders, and by auto-adding missing VarRail voltage adjustables only at slider-creation time (after dumped adjustables have been parsed). Also removed VarRail's custom vertical-panel slider to avoid two separate slider UIs.

outcome.notes: Refresh/import no longer produces duplicate slider rows because the adjustable list is deduped and VarRail auto-adjustable is added only after import parsing.
